attributes.action: Companies with 500+ employees must ensure ALL packaging is over 95% recyclable
attributes.background:
People are active with recycling now. But there's only so much we can do. We can only recycle if the material is recycable. Companies should take more responsibility.

Excess/unsustainable packaging is polluting our home.

Sign now to demand sustainable and efficient recycling from EVERYONE!

rejection.details:
This petition seems to be calling on companies, not the UK Government or Parliament, to take action.

You could also start a new petition setting out clearly the specific action you would like the Government or Parliament to take.

You might also like to sign one of these petitions: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/232684
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/231235
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/230883
